imagingbook.pub.threshold.adaptive

Class InterpolatingThresholder

  • java.lang.Object
    • imagingbook.pub.threshold.Thresholder
      • imagingbook.pub.threshold.adaptive.AdaptiveThresholder
        • imagingbook.pub.threshold.adaptive.InterpolatingThresholder

  • public class InterpolatingThresholder
extends AdaptiveThresholder
    This thresholder splits the image into non-overlapping square sub-images, computes the optimal threshold within each sub-image (using an Otsu thresholder) and interpolates linearly between these local thresholds.
